original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 20:11:48' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-07-09 20:37:10' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 00:00:00'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 20:11:48' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-07-09 20:37:10'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.UserId)
